body.name: PowerXL Air Fryer Vortex - Multi Cooker with Roast, Bake, Food Dehydrator, Reheat Non Stick Coated Basket, Cookbook (7 QT, Black)
features: Air Fryer and multi cooker from PowerXL with Vortex Rapid Air Technology gives you even more air fry crisping power. Your meals cook to maximum crispiness inside a turbo-charged whirlwind of superheated hot air, eliminating the unhealthy oil of a deep fryer. Air Fry your favorite fried meals like onion rings or French fries with a golden-brown crisp and crunch on all sides – not just on the top and bottom. You can also bake, roast, and broil using less or no oil. Easy to use and easy to clean.

#1 Best Selling Air Fryer Brand*: PowerXL high performance airfryers are designed to simplify everyday life. When life keeps you busy, PowerXL’s home and small countertop appliances are your functional experts – those go-to products that help you excel. *Source: The NPD Group/Retail Tracking Service

10 cooking pre-sets are one-touch easy for extra crispy air frying and even more types of cooking: air fry roast, air bake, broil, dehydrate, reheat & more. Dehydrated snacks like fruit leather and jerky are fast and easy bake your favorite desserts, and even roast chicken, meats, vegetables, and more. Use the air fryer recipes cook book or program your own time and temperature.

Timer with Auto Shut-Off with Digital Display Panel. Choose effortlessly from 10 digital pre-sets for precise heating on almost any meal or program the time and temperature you want. No matter what you’re cooking, PowerXL Vortex Airfryers makes it easy. Discover the new solution for busy families who don’t have a lot of time to cook.
body.description: Don’t settle for ordinary air fryers. Discover the PowerXL Vortex Air Fryer from PowerXL, the #1 best selling air fryer brand in the United States*. Now you can get maximum crisp and golden-fried crunch on all sides – not half crisp, half soggy meals. The As Seen on TV PowerXL Vortex Air Fryer rewrites all the rules. The secret to superior air frying is Turbo Cyclonic Vortex Hot Air Circulation that fries food extra crisp inside a whirlwind vortex of superheated air in combination with an Interior Vortex Wall built into the cooking chamber to promote consistent, even air flow. Enjoy even crispier French fries, onion rings, air fried fish, chicken, veggies, and even baked goods – with little to no oil required! You can even roast fresh meats or bake your own air fried doughnuts with optimal cooking results. Innovative, greaseless fryer saves you up to 70% fewer calories from fat while you get even crispier, crunchier, golden-fried taste and texture on all sides. Space saving countertop design is electric and easy to use, just press one of the pre-set buttons on the digital display panel. No matter what you’re cooking, PowerXL Vortex air frying makes it easy. Includes PowerXL cookbook with air fryer recipes. *Source: NPD Group / Retail Tracking Service

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really like this air fryer. Works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was purchased to replace a nearly identical unit from the same manufacturere that failed right at two years of usage. Hence, despite the fact that we use this air fryer pretty mich every day, durability is a question mark. The failure on the original was the main ciruit board / touch controls as I was able to verify power all the way through the safety switch for the basket to the controller.We obviously liked how well the first one worked enough to purchase a replacement. I think that says most of what needs to be said. The fryer is easy to use and worked well up to the point of failure. I am hopeful we can get more than two years out of this one. Time will tell.Folks, if you are considering an air fryer with a wire basket....They are a BEAR to clean. The solid basket is MANY TIMES EASIER to hand clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Peace of mind air fryer
reviews.reviewText: Did a lot of looking at air fryers after reading about potentially harsh chemicals in the costing of the fryer pans. This one is one of the "good ones" and we honestly love it and use it at least 5-6 times a week. Cleaning it is very simple, although it does require a little work to get some of that "baked on" grease out, but it's not bad at all. Cooks quickly, good comes out crispy and juicy! All around a great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely amazing. I love love love it. Since the I received it, that day I used already , and I use it at least every week. I absolutely love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I love it!
reviews.reviewText: Honestly this is the best air fryer I've ever had. I purchased this one because the 5qt of this model I had for 2 years finally died after heavy daily use. The only complaint is the smell. Before you use it, I HIGHLY recommend that you give the basket a good hard scrub to get the coating or whatever they spray on it off. The "new" smell was baked into the first few things we made and lingers in the air for days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Entrga bastante rápido y el articulo igual al ilustrado.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We gifted this to my mother and she love it. It works really well and easy to use. She said it cleans easily too.

This is by far the best air fryer I e ever used. The 7 quart size is perfect for any meal. Chicken comes out juicy and tender not dry. Fries are nice and crisp. As shown in picture this is the size of the container and also can come with a grilling plate for anything you want to grill. It is used pretty much everyday. Definitely recommend it. Curs cooking time in half or more

reviews.reviewTitle: Great little fryer when cooking for 1 person
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, easy to check food while frying, easy to clean
I returned this one because I order too small a size for the two of us.
